controller.gui_bindings module¶

class controller.gui_bindings.Controller(camera: MachineVisionCamera, gui: PyQTWidgetFunction)¶

Bases: object

Controller class that inherits the Ui_MainWindow from the autogenerated pyqt ui file

Parameters:

  • camera (MachineVisionCamera) – instance of the MachineVisionCamera

  • gui (PyQTWidgetFunction) – instace of the current main window

controller.gui_operations module¶

class controller.gui_operations.PyQTWidgetFunction(main_window)¶

Bases: Ui_MainWindow

switch_mode()¶

This method switch the live or debug mode

get_current_mode() → str¶

returns the current mode of the gui: Live or Debug

Returns:

mode – returns string either Debug or Live

Return type:

str

camera_setting()¶

Method that change the camera setting page in StackedWidget

save_data()¶

Method that change into save data page.

open_image() → None¶

Method that opens the image to select the ROI to be used and display in the GUI

choose_directory_path()¶

Method that sets the path to save the image.

get_save_directory_path()¶

Method that returns the path to save the image

get_live_gui_values() → None¶

Function that takes all the user inputs values from GUI and saved in pickle file
